newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunkers steady amid thin discussions.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunkers steady amid thin discussions.

text.p: Singapore bunker indications on Monday were little changed from Friday with sellers unwilling to lower offers, traders said.
Traders said buyers were watching for cleared direction from the cargo market before making their purchases while sellers were holding out at high prices, anticipating a rise in cargo levels.

Discussions were thin on a typical Monday, traders said. They said 380-cst bunker prices were quoted at $121-$122 per tonne and 180-cst at $125-$127 per tonne. MDO and gasoil were steady, quoted at $233 and $240-$246 respectively. --Singapore Newsroom (+65-870-3082)
